Start_Date: 1. If Columns value is NA, then only stock names will be analysed based on conditions of market change values.
2. Market_Change and Stock_Change values can be entered both or any one.
3. Market_Change_Min and Market_Change_Max should both be entered as the stock values will be analysed in that range. Same for Stock_Change_Min and Stock_Change_Min.
4. Market_Change range values and Stock_Change range values can be entered both or any one.
5. If Stock_Cahnge or Market_Change are entered then Market_Change range values and Stock_Change range values should not be entered and vice-versa
